801.name: Happy New Year! The Torpedo Squadron Starts the Sortie!
801.desc: Sortie a CL as flagship and 1-5 DD to [W1-2], [W1-3] and [W1-4]. S-Rank the boss nodes of each map.

802.name: New Year's Irako Support!
802.desc: Sortie an AV, AS or DD as flagship and up to 5 other ships to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node 3 times.

803.name: The Time Has Come! The Aviation Ships' New Year!
803.desc: Sortie a BBV as flagship, 1 other BBV, 2 CAV and up to 2 other ships to [W4-2]. S-Rank the boss node 3 times. You will have to select a reward. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
803.memo: ➣Rewards 3 Screws, a Furniture Fairy and ONLY ONE OF a Shiun OR an Ro.43 Reconnaissance Seaplane OR an OS2U

804.name: New Year's Greeting! The Carrier Task Force Commences the Sortie!
804.desc: Sortie a CV as flagship, 2 DD, and 3 other ships to [W3-5]. S-Rank the boss node 3 times.

831.name: Saury Fishing: Light it Up! Saury Fishing Aid!
831.desc: Have 3 sauries in your inventory. They can be farmed from [W1], [W3], and [W6].

832.name: Saury Fishing: More, More! Keep Fishing for Saury!
832.desc: Have 8 sauries in your inventory. They can be farmed from [W1], [W3], and [W6]. You will be prompted to pick a reward, so do your research beforehand.

833.name: Saury Fishing: Bleeding Edge Saury Fishing! Keep Going!
833.desc: Have 24 sauries in your inventory. They can be farmed from [W1], [W3], and [W6]. You will be prompted to pick a reward, so do your research beforehand.

845.name: Sever the Rear Logistics of the Enemy's Large-Scale Anchorage!
845.desc: Sortie a Surface Task Force to [E-3]. A-Rank+ node J twice.
845.memo: ➣Inflicts one of the two existing debuffs on the boss.

866.name: Saury Fishing: I'm Going to Secure the Saury Harvest!
866.desc: Have 4 Sauries in your inventory. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
866.memo:
➣Rewards:
¶First choice: Either a Furniture Fairy OR 4 Screws
¶Second choice: Either a Type 3 Active Sonar OR a Searchlight OR 4 Combat Rations

867.name: Saury Fishing: I'm Ready to Go All-Out Supporting the Fishing!
867.desc: Have 12 Sauries in your inventory. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
867.memo:
➣Rewards:
¶First choice: Either a Daihatsu Landing Craft OR a WG42 (WurfgerÃ¤t 42) OR a New Model Aviation Armament Materials
¶Second choice: Either 2 Swordfish OR 2 Shiden Kai Ni OR a Skilled Crew Member

868.name: Saury Fishing: Boooom! I'll Fire Up the Big Catch!
868.desc: Have 30 Sauries in your inventory. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
868.memo: ➣Rewards furniture and either a Type124 ASDIC OR a TBF OR an Agano-class fishing banner

654.name: Saiun Procurement and Dismantlement for Transport
654.desc: Have 10 Development Materials and one Type 97 Torpedo Bomber. Scrap one Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane. ☣BEWARE OF CHANGING DIFFICULTIES☣
654.memo:
☣Changing difficulties after the completion of this quest will cause the Saiun (Disassembled for Transport) to disappear!!!
✘Consumes the items and equipment. Make sure the equipment is unlocked!
➣ Rewards Saiun (Disassembled for Transport)

655.name: Saiun Dismantlement for Transport
655.desc: Have 20 Development Materials and one Saiun. Scrap one Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane. ☣BEWARE OF CHANGING DIFFICULTIES AFTERWARDS☣
655.memo:
☣Changing difficulties after the completion of this quest will cause the Saiun (Disassembled for Transport) to disappear!!!
✘Consumes the items and equipment. Make sure the equipment is unlocked!
➣ Rewards Saiun (Disassembled for Transport)

188.name: Fully Formed Nishimura Fleet, Prepare to Sortie!
188.desc: Have Yamashiro, Fusou, Mogami, Michishio, Asagumo, Yamagumo and Shigure in Fleet 3. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
188.memo: ➣Rewards a Reinforcement Expansion and either a Skilled Lookouts OR a Furniture Fairy OR 3 Combat Rations

872.name: Secure the Supply Line Logistics for Operation Sho-Ichi-Go!
872.desc: Sortie to [E-2]. A-Rank+ the boss node twice. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
872.memo: ➣Rewards a Mamiya and either 2 Type 13 Air Radars OR 2 Type 22 Surface Radars OR an Action Report

801.name: Happy New Year! Torpedo Squadron, Commence with the Sorties!
801.desc: Sortie a CL as flagship and up to 5 DD to [W1-2] and [W1-4]. A-Rank+ each boss node twice. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
801.memo: ➣Rewards an Emergency Repair Goddess and either 2 Combat Rations OR 5 Development Materials

802.name: Helping Out Irako in the New Year!
802.desc: Sortie an AV/CA(V)/CL(T)/CT as flagship and up to 5 additional ships to [W2-2] and [W2-3]. A-Rank+ each boss node twice. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
802.memo: ➣Rewards 3 Irako and either a Combat Ration (Special Onigiri) OR 5 Buckets OR a New Model Artillery Armament Materials

803.name: Commence the Escorts! A New Year for the Naval Escort Squadrons!
803.desc: Sortie only DD/DE (1 CVL is allowed) to [W1-5] and [W1-6]. A-Rank+ the [W1-5] boss node three times. Reach [W1-6] node N three times. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
803.memo: ➣Rewards 3 Screws, a Furniture Fairy and either 2 Type 2 Depth Charges OR an Action Report OR a Raiden

804.name: Happy New Year! Carrier Task Force, Sortie at Full Strength!
804.desc: Sortie a CV(B/L) as flagship, 2 DD and 3 additional ships to [W5-5]. A-Rank+ the boss node four times. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
804.memo: ➣Rewards furniture and either a Skilled Crew Member OR 2 New Model Aviation Armament Materials OR 3 Shiden Kai Ni

505.name: Accounting Department Mission: Time to Make Onigiri!
505.desc: Make an Onigiri using 5 Rice while this quest is activated. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
505.memo:
Obtain Rice by farming various maps. Go to the item menu where Medals, Gift Boxes, etc. are shown. Click the upper right > arrow. Select the Rice item, use it, and pick the farthest left choice to make Onigiri.
➣Rewards either a Searchlight OR 2 Screws

506.name: Accounting Department Mission: Treat Everyone to Onigiri!
506.desc: Make 3 more Onigiri using 15 Rice while this quest is activated. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
506.memo:
✘Consumes the Onigiri.
➣Rewards either a Type 2 Large-sized Flying Boat OR a Toku Daihatsu Landing Craft OR a 61cm Triple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount Late Model

507.name: Accounting Department Mission: Time to Make High-Class Onigiri!
507.desc: Make High-Class Onigiri (2nd option) using 6 Rice, 2 Umeboshi and 3 Nori while this quest is activated. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
507.memo: ➣Rewards either a Skilled Lookouts OR two 12cm 30-tube Rocket Launchers OR 7 Buckets

508.name: Accounting Department Mission: A Care Package! It's High-Class Onigiri
508.desc: Make 2 High-Class Onigiri (2nd option) using 12 Rice, 4 Umeboshi and 6 Nori while this quest is activated. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
508.memo:
➣Rewards:
¶First choice: Either 3 Type 0 Fighter Model 52s OR 2 Shiden Kai Ni OR a New Model Aviation Armament Materials
¶Second choice: Either a Furniture Fairy OR a Reinforcement Expansion

509.name: Accounting Department Mission: Let's Make Ochazuke!
509.desc: Make Ochazuke (3rd option) using 8 Rice, 3 Umeboshi, 3 Nori and 4 Tea while this quest is activated. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
509.memo: ➣Rewards either a Canned Saury OR 7 Screws OR a 61cm Quadruple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount Late Model

510.name: Accounting Department Mission: Here, Have Some Ochazuke for Supper!
510.desc: Make 2 Ochazuke (3rd option) using 16 Rice, 6 Umeboshi, 6 Nori and 8 Tea while this quest is activated. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
510.memo:
➣Rewards:
¶First choice: Either a Canned Saury OR a Reinforcement Expansion
¶Second choice: Either a Canned Saury OR a Type 3 Depth Charge Projector (Concentrated Deployment)

511.name: Accounting Department Mission: Let's Make Nori Rolls!
511.desc: Have 12 Rice and 6 Nori in your inventory. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
511.memo:
✘Consumes the food.
➣Rewards a Canned Saury and either a 25mm Triple Autocannon Mount OR a 12cm 30-tube Rocket Launcher

512.name: Accounting Department Mission: Make a Japanese Set Meal and Eat Up!
512.desc: Make 3 Onigiri (1st option) and a Japanese Meal Set (4th option) using 24 Rice, 5 Umeboshi, 6 Nori, 7 Tea and 1 Canned Saury while this quest is activated.
512.memo: ➣Rewards a Type 2 Depth Charge and furniture

513.name: Acc. Dpt. Mission: A Mass Production of Rising Sun Lunch Boxes!
513.desc: Have 50 Rice, 15 Umeboshi and 10 Tea in your inventory. Equip a DD secretary with a 12cm30t Rocket in her first slot and a T2 Depth Charge in any other slot.
513.memo:
✘Consumes the food and the rocket Launcher, but not the depth charge.
➣Rewards a Prototype 15cm 9-tube ASW Rocket Launcher

681.name: Fifth Anniversary Mission I: The Arsenal
681.desc: Scrap 5 Small Cal. Main Guns and 5 Medium Cal. Main Guns. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
681.memo:
➣Rewards:
¶First choice: Either eight Development Materials OR three 12cm 30-tube Rocket Launchers OR two Shiden Kai Ni
¶Second choice: Either a Furniture Fairy OR a New Model Artillery Armament Materials OR a Reinforcement Expansion

882.name: Fifth Anniversary Mission II: Naval Base Region Patrol
882.desc: Sortie a CL(T)/CT as flagship and 3 or more DD/DE to [W1-1], [W1-2], [W1-3], [W1-4] and [W1-5]. A-Rank+ the boss nodes of each.
882.memo:
➣Rewards the DE, Tsushima
☣CAUTION☣You will need this Tsushima reward for the next quest if you lack a modernizable DE.

706.name: Fifth Anniversary Mission III: Modernization
706.desc: Have 555 steel and bauxite. Successfully modernize a DE using 5 DD twice. Press F10 to clear the overlay that blocks the reward selection screen.
706.memo:
✘If no stats are boosted, it doesn't count.
✘There is an unknown factor that causes the quest to not count even when a modernization attempt does add a stat.
✘Consumes the resources.
➣Rewards furniture and either ten Buckets, five Screws, or five Combat Rations.

321.name: Fifth Anniversary Mission IV: Exercises
321.desc: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day using 2 DD/DE and 3 additional ships. You cannot use a 6th ship. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
321.memo:
➣Rewards:
¶First choice: Either five Irako OR a +5 Type 95 Depth Charge
¶Second choice: Either an Action Report OR a +5 12.7cm Twin Gun Mount Model C Kai Ni

883.name: Fifth Anniversary Mission V: The Fifth Anniversary Fleet Sortie!
883.desc: Sortie a CL(T)/CT, 2 DD/DE and up to 3 additional ships. Pick one of these: A-Rank+ all [W2] maps OR A-Rank+ [W5-3] and [W5-5] OR A-Rank+ [W6-5]
883.memo:
You may use up to 3 additional ships.
☣This quest is still being verified. Report any problems to the KC3 team.
➣Rewards the DD, Samuel B. Roberts
